mapper.select: SELECT PR.PROC_NO, TO_CHAR(PR.PROC_DATE, 'YY/MM/DD') AS PROC_DATE , CT.CT_NM, PC.PCC_NAME, E.EMP_NM, PR.PROC_MONEY_TYPE, PR.PROC_MONEY, PT.PT_SAVE, PT.PT_DD FROM PROCEDURE PR INNER JOIN CUSTOMER CT ON PR.CT_NO = CT.CT_NO INNER JOIN PROCEDURE_CODE PC ON PR.PROC_SG_NO = PC.PCC_S_CATE AND PR.PROC_BG_NO = PC.PCC_L_CATE INNER JOIN EMPLOYEE E ON PR.EMP_NO = E.EMP_NO INNER JOIN POINT PT ON PR.PT_NO = PT.PT_NO
SELECT PCC_L_CATE, PCC_S_CATE, PCC_NAME FROM PROCEDURE_CODE PC WHERE PCC_L_CATE = 0

SELECT PC1.PCC_L_CATE, A.PCC_L_NM, PC1.PCC_PRICE, PC1.PCC_NAME AS PCC_S_NM, A.CNT, PC1.PCC_CARD_PT, PC1.PCC_CASH_PT FROM PROCEDURE_CODE PC1 INNER JOIN (SELECT PC2.PCC_S_CATE , PC2.PCC_NAME AS PCC_L_NM, B.CNT FROM PROCEDURE_CODE PC2 INNER JOIN (SELECT PC1.PCC_L_CATE, COUNT(*) AS CNT FROM PROCEDURE_CODE PC1 GROUP BY PC1.PCC_L_CATE) B ON PC2.PCC_S_CATE = B.PCC_L_CATE AND PC2.PCC_L_CATE = 0) A ON PC1.PCC_L_CATE = A.PCC_S_CATE
